title: Staying In The Right Environment | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Staying In The Right Environment | Joel Osteen
description:
You were created to live a life of victory, but if you want to reach your full potential, you have to make sure you’re in the right environment. God wants to use the things and people around you to help you fulfill your God-given destiny. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
